resources.string: CREATE TABLE history (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, url_id INTEGER, time INTEGER)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS urlIndex ON urls (url COLLATE NOCASE)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS visitsIndex ON urls (visits DESC)
ALTER TABLE urls ADD COLUMN fav_time INTEGER DEFAULT -1
UPDATE urls SET favorite = 1, fav_time = time WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT url_id FROM history WHERE favorite = 1)
SELECT DISTINCT urls.id, urls.url, urls.title FROM urls, history WHERE urls.id=history.url_id AND (title LIKE ? OR url LIKE ?) ORDER BY history.time DESC LIMIT ?
SELECT h.id, u.url, u.title, h.time FROM urls AS u, history AS h WHERE u.id=h.url_id ORDER BY h.time DESC LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
SELECT title, url, fav_time FROM urls WHERE favorite = 1 ORDER BY fav_time DESC
SELECT urls.* FROM urls,history WHERE history.id=? AND history.url_id=urls.id
SELECT ID FROM URLS WHERE URL=?
